title: Cracked Dungeon Bricks
summaries: Cracked Dungeon Bricks can be found in Dungeons, or can be crafted with Dungeon Bricks at a Heavy Work Bench. Crafted Cracked Dungeon Bricks behave the same as naturally generated Cracked Dungeon Bricks, and do not drop an item upon destruction.

Cracked Dungeon Bricks behave similarly to <linked>Thin Ice</linked> and <linked>Sand</linked>, but with distinct differences from both. If jumped on, walked across, <linked>grappled</linked> to, mined with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or hit by <linked>projectiles</linked>, several Cracked Dungeon Bricks nearby the targeted tile, including the tile itself, may fall and be destroyed upon hitting solid ground, dropping no item. Unlike ordinary Dungeon Bricks, Cracked Dungeon Bricks can be mined with any pickaxe.

Destroying the Cracked Dungeon Bricks naturally generated in the Dungeon may reveal hidden pathways to other parts of the Dungeon that are otherwise inaccessible without proper tools and doing so is often required to access significant portions of the Dungeon if the player is unable to mine the Dungeon Bricks.
